column1: Clement Town is a cantonment town in Dehradun city
column2: Dehradun district in the state of Uttarakhand
column3: India. Clement Town is 7 km from clock tower in main city of Dehradun.  Saharanpur and Haridwar are 65 and 54 km respectively. It also borders Rajaji National Park and is home to several renowned institutions. Schools such as Raja Ram Mohan Roy Academy and St. Mary's are in the neighbourhood. Country singer Bobby Cash resides in Clement Town.
